text:
Nasim Zaidi, Chief Election Commissioner (centre), addresses a press conference in Chennai on Thursday. Achal Kumar Jyoti, Election Commissioner (left), and Om Prakash Rawat, Election Commissioner, are in the picture. — Photo : S. R. Raghunathan

Determined to curb the menace of distribution of money, the Election Commission has planned to come up with a comprehensive strategy. Page 4
title: EC to tighten grip on money for votes
